animals.animalText: A strong individual, your inclination towards solitude masks your inner warmth.
Ever reliable, you enjoy the company of people and are best known for exuding warmth and love.
Strong and independent, you enjoy your privacy and gazing into long distances, reflecting upon life's many wonders.
Fanciful, with an ever present optimism, your presence is always appreciated.
Not easily understood, you are an intriguing creature and the subject of peopleâ€™s fascination.
Despite shying away from public gatherings, those rare occasions that you are present people revel in your warmth.
A mysterious creature, you enjoy your privacy. Very little is known about you but people are still fond of you.
A wondrous, much-loved creature, your reputation for the mythical masks your private nature and the fact that you are seldom seen.
